everspread.Name: Everspread
everspread.Description: Status moves go last but lay Toxic Spikes.

furiouscopy.Name: Furious Copy
furiouscopy.Description: When the user is hit, negates dmg and swaps form once.

hypervanitym.Name: Hypervanity M
hypervanitym.Description: The user's Atk/Def is raised/lowered by 1 when it switches in.

hypervanityf.Name: Hypervanity F
hypervanityf.Description: The user's Sp.Atk/Sp.Def is raised/lowered by 1 when it switches in.

mirrorspell.Name: Mirror Spell
mirrorspell.Description: When switching in, reflects Sp. Attacks.

nordicspirit.Name: Nordic Spirit
nordicspirit.Description: If Snow is active, Aurora Veil is set on switch.

onetwo.Name: One-Two
onetwo.Description: Punching moves hit twice. 2nd hit deals half damage.

parasomnia.Name: Parasomnia
parasomnia.Description: Sleeping enemies have their health sapped. Accuracy of sleep moves increased.

rebinding.Name: Rebinding
rebinding.Description: Only once, cannot be KO, switches out, and heals 100% HP.

shuffletype.Name: Shuffle Type
shuffletype.Description: The user's type changes sporadically every turn.

soulconductor.Name: Soul Conductor
soulconductor.Description: Moves that affect the soul are stronger.

tidalneigh.Name: Tidal Neigh
tidalneigh.Description: Increases Defense when user defeats an opponent.

vacuumcore.Name: Vacuum Core
vacuumcore.Description: Electric and wind-based moves are drawn in, increasing SpAtk.

warpingneigh.Name: Warping Neigh
warpingneigh.Description: Increases Sp.Def when user defeats an opponent.

windmaestro.Name: Wind Maestro
windmaestro.Description: Forces active ally to take attacks. Wind moves boost Attack.

witheringoffer.Name: Withering Offer
witheringoffer.Description: Boosts every stat after knocking out an ally.

apttoserve.Name: Apt to Serve
apttoserve.Description: Lowers Speed when Trick Room is active.

cremation.Name: Cremation
cremation.Description: Boosts Sp. Def each time a PokÃ©mon faints.

snowball.Name: Snowball
snowball.Description: Moves that lock the user into attacking are 1.3x power and increase defenses.

songstress.Name: Songstress
songstress.Description: Negates and powers up its own Sound-Type moves if hit by one.

flametouch.Name: Flame Touch
flametouch.Description: May burn targets when a PokÃ©mon makes contact.

supersweetsyrup.Name: Supersweet Syrup
supersweetsyrup.Description: Lowers the foe's evasion once per battle.

meltingpoint.Name: Melting Point
meltingpoint.Description: Changes form when hit by fire type or burn-inducing move.

phasechange.Name: Phase Change
phasechange.Description: Ice moves become water and get 1.5x power.
